## Checklist (must be completed before merging)

- [ ] No linting errors (run `npm run lint:fix`)
- [ ] No console logs (remove all `console.log` statements)
- [ ] No commented-out code or comments (remove all commented-out code)
- [ ] No loose strings (all UI text comes form `strings` constants)
- [ ] No conflicts with `develop` (merge `develop` into your branch and resolve conflicts)
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines (see [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md))
